attributes.title: Full Stack Developer
attributes.description:
## Who is Full Stack Specialist? 
Like all professions related to the IT field, this type of development is prevalent in the CIS market, Europe, and the United States. That is why we are looking for a person who wants to learn and develop in this niche.

A full-stack developer is a universal programmer, and he can create a functional product without a basis, just from scratch. To work in our team, he must have basic knowledge in development, know English at the B1 + level, and desire to improve.## Responsibilities
* Bug fixes;
* Version control, database, continuous integration;
* Development of projects from scratch, as well as refinement of existing ones;
* Interaction with designers and other developers;
* Cross-browser and adaptive HTML5 / CSS3 layout;
* Work with the user interface to provide visualization and animation of pages.
## What do we need you to know?
The RemotEmployees team needs a specialist who, in addition to knowledge of HTML, JavaScript, PHP, and API, has experience with CMS, for example, WordPress, Joomla, Shopify, and others. You must also be able to work with the Git version control system (and have a profile on GitHub). All other skills will be a huge plus. The Full-Stack vacancy at RemotEmployees is not only an excellent opportunity to work where you want and have a great experience, develop existing skills, improve language skills, and just work in a great and young team.## Ð¡onditions of employment
You can choose a convenient work schedule: day shifts from 9 am to 6 pm, evening from 3 pm to midnight. 
In addition, you need a good computer and the Internet to always be in touch with us.## Interested in a vacancy?
Want to try yourself in what you like? Stop hesitating and wasting your time! Send your [video resume](/videointerview) in English as soon as possible, and we will contact you. Become part of our team!
## The task of the Full-Stack web developer
* Participate in site design
* Landing Page Layout
* Work with existing code
* Monitor server status
* Work with system modules
attributes.subTitle: We need a specialist in an outstaffing company
attributes.cardDescription: RemotEmployees is searching for a Full Stack developer with B1 + English to work on international projects. Here you can find a permanent job in IT, get a stable salary, continuously grow and develop, and most importantly - work from home.
